item.title: Designing Beautiful Worlds with Procedural Texture Generation
item.description: In this project I tried to procedurally generate visually appealing 3D renders of planets and stars. By layering a bunch of noise functions we can create complex textures that resemble space.

item.title: Reverse Engineering Blender's AgX Tonemapper
item.description: Blender 4 introduced AgX as the default tone mapper, offering better handling of high-intensity colors. While integrating it into my own projects, I struggled with its LUT-based implementation and chose to create my own approximation, focusing on visual appeal over accuracy.
